title: 25' Walk Test
label: 25fw
info: Direct patient to one end of a clearly marked 25 foot course and instruct patient to walk 25 feet as quickly (but safely) as possible.
Immediately administer again by having the patient walk back the same distance. The average of the two tests will be automatically calculated and will appear on the graph.
Patients may use assistive devices when doing this task. Discontinue if the patient cannot complete in 3 minutes (180 seconds) or cannot complete Test 2 after a 5-minute wait period.
